newsPageSlogan: Headlines by Kurdchain brings you the latest crypto news, Bitcoin news, Blockchain news and project signals in the cryptocurrency world
aboutSlogan: Kurdchain is a financial trading community which was established in 2020 by a team of professional traders with over 5 years of experience in the field. We provide the best educational packages to serve investors and traders to have the best knowledge about financial market sectors. Also, we provide capital investment management services through Application Programming Interface (API) and contract. Kurdchain serves as intermediary among the customers to make their exchanges possible and easier. Furthermore, it brings you the latest crypto news, Bitcoin news, Blockchain news and project signals in the cryptocurrency world. Lastly, our mission is to make professional and wealthy traders.
